reviews.review_text: I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it. Peter the installer was so nice to pack my All Season Tires in a Bag without any ripping and cleaned. I have taken my vehicle for repairs for many years now and I trust thier work and dedication plus they care for the customer and tell you what is need it and what you dont need as many other shops that try to sell you things you dont need. I would recommend this location to anyone who needs any kind of work for your vehicle. Clean Shop, Nice and pleasant staff plus excellent service. As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like: Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi G Brenes, Im happy to hear that the Auto Service Team has provided you with such great service over the years and Ill be sure to recognize both Tao and Peter for the extra effort during your recent winter tire purchase. Its great to see such a detailed review outlining all the various services we provide our customers coming from a prominent local guide. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you over the years. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you during your next visit. - Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee  Mei Lin  was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Richard! We will be sure to recognize Mei Lin for her efforsts. We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Superb service, communication, and pricing. For something straightforward like a tire change, you cant go wrong here. Its not their fault the City of Vancouver decided to divert most of its residential development to commercial and industrial areas, creating a shortage of mechanic shop space. All shops are busy these days. Service: Tires
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sebastian! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Talk about above-and-beyond service! Servive Advisor Bill Clarke went out of his way to help me keep my car running, gave realistic advice to determining the priority and schedule proceed. Im also thrilled at the work your mechanics were able to provide. Ill be recommending your service centre to anyone with a vehicle, and you and Bill have secured tjis location a customer for life.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Erika! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: After having a negative experience at the Canadian Tire Auto Centre in North Van on Saturday, the Grandview location has restored my faith in the brand. Stanley was extremely helpful over the phone and I was able to get my car looked at within half an hour of calling. They took my car in right before closing and managed to patch my tire all within about 2 hours of the first phone call (over Easter weekend as well). Any time I have needed work done quickly without breaking the bank, this location has always been wonderful to deal with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sammie, Thanks for taking the time to provide us with this feedback. Im pleased to hear Stanley was helpful and able to get your vehicle into the shop quickly. Were lucky to have experienced advisors like Stanley on our team. Well see you next time you! Tao, Auto Service Centre

reviews.review_text: Stopped in last min to get some help with some missing lug nuts we discovered after my car started making a horrible sound. Everyone was so lovely and went the extra mile to help us out. The thing that really stood out was just the genuine care and even great conversation!! You have some wonderful, kind hearted people on your team working there! Kudos you rescued us and made our night!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Lauren! We really appreciate the 5 stars and are happy to be able to help you out. Our Auto team will be pleased to know that their efforts were appreciated. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Amanda, Auto Centre Manager

reviews.review_text: I recently bought a second hand Subaru and brought it to Canadian Tire for inspection and service. Whatever it is you need the man to see is Bill Clarke. Bill was professional, efficient and most of all personable when helping me. He took time to explain what service diagnosis was for the car and brought me to the floor to review. Also, he gave, what seemed to me,  honest advice about when certain maintenance did / did not need to be done. Bill Clarke is the man, see him for help with auto related items. Thanks for your help!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing this experience, Jared. We are very fortunate to have team members like Bill who strive to provide a 5-star experience to our customers. Ill be sure to recognize Bill for a job well done. Enjoy your new ride! Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: I store my winter tires with this location, and had the check engine light come on just before I was going to get my tires swapped over for the spring. I decided to get the whole car checked over and oil changed, etc. They provide the work order of everything that needed some work and advised what needed to be done immediately vs what could be put off which I really appreciated. I ll definitely be going back for more honest work/repairs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Dan! Im happy to hear you appreciate us outlining the recommended and suggested work for your vehicle on the work order. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: Highly qualified and knowledgeable staff. Immediately knew what to do with my complex case of international import. Adjusted appointment and helped immediately.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving a 5-star rating, Varun! We appreciate your support and are glad you had a positive experience. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Very good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5-star rating! We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: A go to place for all my vehicle needs... friendly service and the best price Ive seeen for tire storage!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Im happy we were able to help you with your tire storage needs and glad to hear we are your preferred shop. See you next time! - Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: CANADIAN TIRE, BUT EVERYTHING IS FROM CHINA. STILL GOOD STORE THOUGH.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate the 5-stars Kochanski! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Fast and quick service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear you had a fast and quick service experience. Thank you for the positive review, and we hope to continue providing you with great service in the future. Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Love Canada tire! If you need to ask why, just go visit one.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear you love our store William, thanks for the 5-stars. See you next time! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Always has amazing deals
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5-star rating! We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Always reliable service keeping my vehicle safe and running smooth
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the five-star rating! We really appreciate your feedback. - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Amanda and Chuck did a wonderful job of fixing the problems of my car!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review David Ill be sure to recognize Amanda and Chuck for a job well done. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: Quick no frills service. Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your 5-star experience, Raven. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Very happy with my winter tires this week!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear your winter tires are working well Bri its certainly been quite the week to put them to the test. Stay safe and well see you at your next visit! - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Great service with these guys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Eli were glad to hear youre happy with our service. Well see you next time! - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Great staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, gaurav! We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars Ali, see you next time! - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: fast pickup service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-stars! Were happy to hear you found the pick-up service fast! Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Bradley! Im happy to hear the team provided awesome service. Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: This is the store closest to me. I used to go to rmd to find a Chinese-speaking staff. I am very happy that now this store has Chinese-speaking staff in order to enhance its service. Amada enthusiastically helped me, so that my business such as car inspection and tire replacement can go smoothly. Not bad
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our shop and provide this feedback Ramona. Im delighted to hear that Amanda was helpful with your inspection and tire change. We are lucky to have Amanda on our team. We hope to see you again soon. Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: Diversity
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rex! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team
Thank you for your 5-star rating! We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Amana was excellent. She called when she said she would and gave me great advice. I trusted her judgement and she took care of getting my new used truck road worthy. Thanks Amana and team Canadian Tire. I ll be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Im happy to hear that Amanda provided you with excellent service to get your truck road worthy Ill be sure to recognize her. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: Its always a delight to look for things I need, just Im stunned  for some need to clean the elevators blood drops.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Were glad to hear that you find it easy to locate the items you need in our store. However, were sorry to hear about the issue with the elevator cleanliness. We will review this with our team. Thank you for bringing it to our attention, and we hope to continue providing you with a positive shopping experience in the future.

reviews.review_text: The Stock Datas in their computer not accurate, but the shopping experience and environment was still good because of the service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 4 stars Arthur! Were happy to hear you had good service despite some issues with our inventory data. We are working hard to keep things as accurate as possible but we can definitely be better. Hopefully your next visit our system will be more accurate for what you are looking for. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: This is a good store where you can find all kind of common good. The prices are average. Sometimes is hard to find help finding something you know the store has.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-stars,  s u     uo  . We look forward to seeing you next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: They gave my dad a free tire repair By putting a plug in for free!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to help out! Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Good prices and return policy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Kenneth glad you found some good deals and are happy with the returns process! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: It ll do in a pinch
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review we value your rating and feedback. Grandview Auto Service Team

Hi Irvan thanks for the review... Id love to learn how we can improve to make your next visit to our shop a 5-star experience. Feel free to give me a call if you have anything youd like to share or discuss. 604-431-3572 Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: The most disorganized automotive service centre I have come across. Missing paperwork, quoted times hours off, every service writer providing different information, zero customer communication whatsoever. Polite but ineffective.
They sluff u off, mabye because they are so busy. I will shop elsewhere for that kind of service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value your rating and feedback, Conrad. Were sorry we did not meet your expectations and we will share this with our leadership team. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Went to get a tire repair done. Super easy task.was told that they didnt have the proper machine to remove tire from rim.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were sorry we were unable to assist you with your tire repair. Unfortunately, the style of rim you brought in is not something we typically work on which is why we were unable to help. We dont want to damage your new rim. Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Good enough buy trying to get me to get spark plugs when I just replaced them 4 months ago
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear we provided good service, Drew. Thanks for the review! Grandview Auto Service Team

Hi Victor, were sorry that we did not meet your expectations during you recent visit to our shop. Wed love to learn how we can make your next visit a 4 or 5-star experience. If theres anything we can help with please feel free to give a member of our management team a call at 604-431-3570. We hope your next visit is better one. Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Cons: Very lack of products. Example, No in stock windshield washer all seasons. Not enough stock for oil drain plug, very expensive $8 dollars when its real cost only $3 buck. The brake shoes or brake pad not on shelter. Mostly products overpriced. Pros: convenient nearby groceries shopping.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback, and were sorry to hear about your experience. Well work on addressing the product availability and pricing concerns youve raised. Your comments are valuable and will help us improve. Were pleased to know you find our location convenient for nearby groceries, and we hope to better serve you in the future. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Go to Canadian tire to buy camping gear never to fix your car or change a tire, just waited 2 hours to have them tell me they cant fix my tire, they probably had made this assesment in the first 2 minites , had to actually ask to see what was going on or they would have had me waiting another 2 hours! Not the first time I have had bad service. Will never be back to fix anything regarding my vehicles.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value your rating and feedback, Adan. Were sorry we did not meet your expectations during your recent visit to our shop. Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: This canadian tire is just understaffed, understocked, employees have no care here. Get away from the self checkouts they are horrible you employe people to work yes? Then lets get them to have a cheerful manner, create a place we want to come back to, h9nestly I dread coming here and when I forget about how horrible your workers are, I leave completely dissapointed and reminded about why I hate this canadian tire.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Were sorry to hear that you had a negative experience at our store. We take customer service seriously, and we apologize if our employees did not provide the level of service you expected. We will address this issue with our staff and work to improve our customer service standards. We appreciate your feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you better in the future.

reviews.review_text: Have a flat tire asked them how much to repair it. Was told around $40 but no appointments for 10 days! Leave the car if you want. Thats Canadas garage for you. Cant do a 10 minute repair so a guy can get to work. Mechanic down the road said bring it right in its a quick fix.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value your rating and feedback, Ty. Sorry we did not meet your expectations we will share this with our leadership team. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Very badly managed store for servicing, jiffy lube is professional compared to them. Short drive to the other franchises is better.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were sorry to hear about your negative experience at our store. We take your feedback seriously and will work to improve our service. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we hope you might consider giving us another chance in the future to provide you with the service you deserve. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Truly one of the worst Canadian Tire store in whole Vancouver. You need to look around for quite few minutes to find someone to help you or open cabinets, and when they show up, they dont normally have the expertise to help about the product. Customer service staff are absolutely out of their line to NOT help you; rude and unfriendly, and if your returning something by default everything is your fault not product issue.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, Babak. Were sorry for the dissapointment. We value your rating and feedback and will review this with our leadership team to make improvements to our services. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: This store automotive customer service even not worth for 1star!!!! I took my VAN two days ago and this was my bad experience. First; the lady at the front desk  was bored or tired attitude -to be nice with her- I guess you can improve customer service. Second; the inspection was very poor or the mechanics maybe were not interested in my car -I was told just to change the battery and I know my van need more work to do- what a difference with Canadian tire at marine way. I took another Van next day to Canadian tire at marine way and the feedback about my van was wayyyy better.  Hope this will help to improve your customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value your rating and feedback Juan and I will certainly review with my team. I apologize that we did not meet your expectations during your recent visit to our shop if theres anything else you would like to discuss please give me a call at the store. Id appreciate learning more about the specifics we can improve on with the inspection report. Mladen, General Manager 604-431-3570

reviews.review_text: This happened (July 3 @ 12:12pm) and my experience was horrible and beyond shocked how rude, immature and VERY unprofessional the employee I was talking to from this store in the AUTOMOTIVE department.  STAY AWAY FROM THIS STORE. This store do not even deserve 1 star after having that conversation with that horrible human being. I am about to purchase over a thousand dollar set of tires online for my vehicle and called the AUTOMOTIVE service and see how much would they charge for tire change. Whoever answer that call from AUTOMOTIVE department must be fired if Canadian Tire DONT wanna lose future loyal customers. I can guarantee that HE do not care about Canadian Tire as a company as he do not care about me trying to spend over a thousand dollars for this store. I am just trying to ask some legitimate questions and just want 30 seconds of his time but he chose to hang up on me for he said he is busy. I was even polite to ask him to please bear with me as I am looking for the correct information of my car to avoid confusion but he instead just hang up like a CHILD who has TEMPER TANTRUMS. If He don t care about me who is about to spend over a thousand dollars to  bring business to the company in exchange for 30 seconds of his paid time by the Canadian Tire, I m wondering how he treat those customers who spend less than that. To the extremely RUDE and UNPROFESSIONAL person who answered my call, my TIME is as precious as your time SIR! If you do not wish to answer legitimate questions from customers then clearly youre in the wrong business and if you hate getting calls then QUIT YOUR JOB to spare Canadian Tire an embarrassment and losing business for having YOU. You are dragging down some good employee from this store and that how selfish of you. Mopping floor as a job do not require answering calls from customers just to give you an idea. Im wondering how the elders are treated when they call this store and you happen to be on the other line. To the executive officers and Shareholders of Canadian Tire who are reading this,  youre setting your bar really really low for having this horrible PERSON representing your company. I am a loyal Canadian Tire customer and now I will also cancel my triangle Mastercard. I will promise not to bring business to this company EVER. I know it doesnt affect that much in your business but I will spread words to every person I know that is trying to bring business with Canadian Tire in the future. I already filed a complaint at the head office and Im hoping its not too late for the company to address this issue before losing another loyal customers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Liam please feel free to give me or Mladen our Store Manager a call so we can learn more about what happened. The feedback youve provided is certainly concerning. We value your business and hope to make things right. Chris, General Manager 604-431-3570

reviews.review_text: Over priced!  Got stuck taking my truck here a couple of times and they charged me way too much for small jobs I couldnt do myself. Person that I spoke to was nice and said they would waive part the diagnostic but when I went to pick it up the clerk there didnt acknowlege it at all. Seems as tho they make alot of money adding an extra hour onto every bill when you drop something off even if you know what is wrong with the vehicle and they dont actually use that time figuring it out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were sorry to hear about your dissapointment with our repair service. We value your rating and feedback and will review this information to see where we can make improvements. If theres anything else we can assist with please feel free to reach a member of our management team. 604-431-3570 Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Who is answering the phones at this store?!?! Ive called about 10 times, select the department that I want and go on hold. After a brief hold, I am looped back to the beginning and again asked which department I need and what service and go on hold. Looped back to the beginning again and again and again. OR the alternative happens and you just plain get hung up on or the phone rings out. No voice-mail, no let us call you back, nada! This is ridiculous and unprofessional. Do you even want the business? Doesnt seem like you do. Maybe dont have a phone line if you have no intention of answering it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ann, Im sorry that you are having trouble reaching us by phone. We have many people answering phones but call volumes have been quite high over the past week heading into the long weekend. Feel free to email me with a callback number and I will have someone reach out to you. Acheng@gvasl.com Amanda, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: This store automotive customer service even not worth for 1star!!!! A guy who usually get the phone in every morning time, he always giving me an attitute when I ask to get appointment every single moments. What was the big deal to deal with make an appoinment? Why you just hold the phone each single time while someone ask you to make an appoinment!!!!! why are you being hostile in way your speak? Who do you think you are? Why you getting pay for it? Did u even get trained to deal with customer? Or brain problem with family background? Did someone affect to your personality?  Why you guys still giving pay for him? It looked he got lots of complain before in this google reviews. Karma will must bite you back. you will must pay.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, please feel free to give me a call at the store so I can better understand the issue you are having with one of our service advisors. Im sorry to learn of your frustration. Amanda, Auto Service Manager 604-431-3572

reviews.review_text: Super bad and incompetent customer service !! We just wanted to get an oil change for our van and they did not ask us in advance for the height of our vehicle and when we dropped our car off they just said yeah we cant do it (hoist is not tall enough but they knew its a campervan) without giving us any alternatives. So basically we came there for nothing..very disappointing ... we wont come back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: This was an honest mistake and were sorry for the disappointment. We value your rating and feedback and will learn from this to improve our service. Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Spreading Covid 19. Most of the staff are not wearing masks. Why not make the summer students? It would help them understand that they are part of a bigger picture.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chad, were sorry to hear of your dissapointment with Covid safety in our store. We have implemented many measures to ensure our staff and customers are safe. It is not required for all staff to wear masks however many of our team members do wear them and for those that work in areas that can be difficult to keep proper physical distance it is required. Feel free to give a member of our management team a call if you would like to further discuss. Wed be happy to learn how we can make your shopping experience more comfortable. CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: They don t install tires that are wider than OEM-specified.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kharl, we are sorry we did not meet your expectations during your recent visit to our shop. Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Do not waste your time with this place, because they wont hesitate to waste your time. They are so over priced and customer service is basically none existant
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ehasn we value your rating and feedback and hope to make your your next visit a better one. If theres anything else that we can assist with please feel free to reach a member of our management team. 604-431-3570 Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Terrible customer service. Would not advise going there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vincent, Im sorry to hear that you were not happy with the service you received during your recent visit to our shop. We strive to provide a 5-star experience to every customer so please feel free to give me a call so I can learn more about the situation and try and make things right. - Tao, Auto Service Manager 604-431-3572

reviews.review_text: Too slow
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kyle, Im sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your recent visit to our shop. We value your rating and feedback and will review to see where we can be quicker for next time. If theres anything I can assist with please feel free to call me at 604-431-3572 Amanda, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: Dismissive employees, no interest to help.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Irish, were sorry to hear of your dissapointment with our team. Feel free to reach out to a member of our management team 604-431-3570 if theres anything further youd like to discuss regarding an employee not being helpful. Our team focuses really hard on providing a 5-star shopping experience so its concerning that you felt staff were dismissive and unhelpful. We hope to make your next visit a better one. CT Grandview Team

Im sorry that we did not meet your expectations during you recent visit to our store. Id love to learn how we can make your next visit a 4 or 5 star experience. If theres anything I can help with please feel free to reach me or any member of our management team at 604-431-3570. We hope your next visit is better one. Hellen, Customer Experience Manager

Hi Anshu, Im sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your recent visit to our shop. If theres anything I can assist with please feel free to call me at 604-431-3572 Amanda, Auto Service Manager
